mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cinema_room( room_no, cinema_no, room_name, room_floor, room_begin_time, room_finish_time, room_regdate, room_chgdate, room_status ) values ( seq_room_no.nextval, #{cinema_no}, #{room_name}, #{room_floor}, to_timestamp(#{room_begin_time},'HH24:MI:SS'), to_timestamp(#{room_finish_time},'HH24:MI:SS'), sysdate, sysdate, #{room_status} )
mapper.select: select * from tbl_cinema_room room where room_no = #{room_no}
mapper.update: update tbl_cinema_room set room_name = #{room_name}, room_floor = #{room_floor}, room_begin_time = to_timestamp(#{room_begin_time},'HH24:MI:SS'), room_finish_time = to_timestamp(#{room_finish_time},'HH24:MI:SS'), room_chgdate = sysdate, room_status = #{room_status} where room_no = #{room_no}
